patterns: Do You Have My Back
responses: You should ask your partner this so you know they're someone you can count on.

patterns: What Do You Consider Cheating
responses: Cheating means different things to different people.

patterns: How Much Honesty Is Needed
responses: Honesty is obviously one of the most important things you can have in your relationship.

patterns: How I Changed Over The Past Few Years
responses: Asking your partner about how they've grown or changed over the past few years can say a lot about the type of person they are.

patterns: Want Out Of This Relationship
responses: If you're going to take your relationship to the next level, you need to be on the same page.

patterns: How Do I Deal With Difficult Situations
responses: It's important to ask and/or observe how your partner copes with difficult emotions, relational situations, and conflict

patterns: Why Didn't my Last Relationship Work Out
responses: It's important to ask these questions because you can learn about your partner's ability to accept responsibility for their own mistakes, as well as how your partner has handled conflict in the past

patterns: How to Deal With Your Feelings And Emotions
responses: Your childhood is known to affect your relationships as an adult.

patterns: What Do You Personally Think Of Your Friend's Relationships
responses: Asking your partner if they feel like their friend's relationships are happy can reveal their views on marriage

patterns: Do You Feel That We Make Each Other Better People
responses: Before taking your relationship to the next level, it¡¯s important to make sure that you both feel like you are better together and not better apart

patterns: What Do You Value Most About Our Relationship
responses: This question is helpful to ask because it allows our partner the space to acknowledge the strengths they see in the relationship, while also understanding what we might be able to tend to a little bit more
